data.title: ministry – WGGS TV
data.text:
9:30PM Tuesdays Kings Mountain Family Worship Center is a church-body affiliated with the Church of God (Cleveland, TN). The Church of God is the oldest continuing Pentecostal church body in existence. FWC makes no apologies for being Pentecostal in […]

6:30AM WEEKDAYS Join Carrie on the daily Life Foundations broadcast as she shares foundational truths of God’s Word with practical ways of how those truths transform your everyday life. https://www.charisbiblecollege.org/life-foundations/

Dr. Esther Shekher’s messages are based on her book, “All the Commandments of Christ” which is a checklist of Jesus’ Commandments from the Gospels of Matthew and John. These commandments are in an extremely simplified tabular form very clearly highlighting the rewards for obedience and consequences of disobedience to the commandments of Christ. […]

SUNDAYS 7:00AM Our ministry remains dedicated to its five-fold purpose: to take the Way of salvation to thousands who live right among us; to light a candle in the darkness of immorality; to resist the […]

Sundays 6:30AM Pastor Anthony is a man that loves all people. Every soul matters; not just the redeemed, but those with a life scarred by sin. Anthony and Shelia Wynn are motivated by the understanding […]

Robert Morris is the founding lead senior pastor of Gateway Church, a multicampus church based out of the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex. Since it began in 2000, the church has grown to more than 71,000 active attendees. […]

Saturdays at 3:00PM Joy for the Journey, with Dell Hyssong, is a practical study of the Word of God. He uses touching illustrations from his 45 years of ministry to make the Bible come alive. You […]

11:30AM Sunday Tomorrow’s World makes sense of your world through the pages of the Bible. Sponsored by the Living Church of God, Tomorrow’s World proclaims the good news of the coming Kingdom of God and warns of the troubled times ahead. https://www.tomorrowsworld.org/

9:30PM Fridays Andrew is an inspirational speaker; an award winning educator; a longtime radio-television broadcaster; civic and political leader; and a man on a mission to share his love of God and country through an […]

Tuesdays 6:30PM After graduating from Northwestern College with a Bachelor of Science degree in Education in 1975, I auditioned and was accepted into a group called TRUTH, based out of Mobile, AL. It’s leader was […]
